channel.title: 508 ancient/lunar help with player rights

item.title: 508 ancient/lunar help with player rights
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Hey, Iâ€™m using Berky-Scape source and in the commands.java file I want to make it so people with 0 and 1 rights can do ::lunar and ::ancients, since only owner can do it. This is what it is currently

} else if (cmd[0].equals("lunar")) { p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 430); // Magic tab (lunar) } else if (cmd[0].equals("ancients")) { p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 193); // Magic tab (lunar) } else if (cmd[0].equals("modern")) { p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 192); // Modern spells;
What would I change in there so mods and normal players can do those?

Read full topic
